AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rice farmer child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a rice farmer family and spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood laboring in their expansive paddy fields.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: alchemist's apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to a renowned alchemist at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the secrets of the five elements and the mysteries of life and death.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: silk weaver child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a family of silk weavers. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] early years assisting them and learning the delicate art of silk weaving.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tea farmer child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a family of tea farmers. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood laboring in the fields and learning about the cultivation and processing of tea leaves.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scribe apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to a local scribe at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the delicate art of calligraphy and the profound wisdom in ancient texts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: river child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up near a great river, where local storytellers would often recount a legendary battle fought there. The tales sparked [PAWN_possessive] interest in strategy and warfare.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: grove child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up near a grove said to grant longevity. The tales of immortality and the grove's beauty inspired [PAWN_possessive] love for nature and healing arts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lake child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised near a legendary lake said to be the home of a transformed serpent. This sparked [PAWN_possessive] curiosity in transformation and the mysteries of nature.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: flute child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a village where an ancient flute, said to belong to a legendary figure, was kept. The stories and music inspired [PAWN_possessive] love for arts and culture.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bamboo cutter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a bamboo forest, where [PAWN_pronoun] helped [PAWN_possessive] family cut and sell bamboo. The hard work and natural surroundings shaped [PAWN_possessive] physical abilities and understanding of plants.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: potter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice in a workshop that crafted terracotta figures. The detailed work honed [PAWN_possessive] fine motor skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: drummer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a drummer for a local militia, responsible for conveying commands across the battlefield. The role honed [PAWN_possessive] sense of rhythm and understanding of strategy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tea server
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served tea in a renowned teahouse frequented by scholars. Listening to their discussions, [PAWN_pronoun] gained a broad knowledge of the world.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: jade carver's apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to a skilled jade carver. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the craft of transforming raw jade into beautiful objects, developing both physical strength and artistic skill.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warrior's apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to a legendary warrior, assisting in daily chores while learning the art of warfare.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: shadow art student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed in a secret society dedicated to the art of stealth and intrigue. Here, [PAWN_pronoun] learned the skills required to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: soapmaker's apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to a local soapmaker. This laborious work required a strong understanding of basic alchemy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sleeping dragon
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Known as the "Sleeping Dragon," [PAWN_nameDef] possessed hidden potential that lay dormant for years. [PAWN_pronoun] lived a quiet life, appearing unremarkable to others, but when roused, [PAWN_pronoun] revealed [PAWN_possessive] true power and became an rare genius to be reckoned with.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rice farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] life working on the family's rice farm. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to cultivate, plant, and harvest rice.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: silk weaver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a silk weaver, a highly respected profession in [PAWN_possessive] village. Although it was a laborious task, [PAWN_pronoun] loved the process of creating beautiful garments from the raw silk.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: canal builder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on the construction of canals and irrigation systems in [PAWN_possessive] village. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the importance of hard work, planning, and cooperation in these large-scale projects.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: herbalist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a herbalist in a small village. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time peacefully foraging for plants and preparing remedies for the villagers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: street vendor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a street vendor, known for [PAWN_possessive] distinct and sometimes irritating voice which [PAWN_pronoun] used to attract customers to [PAWN_possessive] stall.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: monk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Buddhist monk living in a secluded temple. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to live with the bare minimum, finding solace in the simple life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: acupuncturist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an acupuncturist in a small village. [PAWN_pronoun] was fascinated by the idea of improving the human body and often dreamed of integrating technology to further enhance [PAWN_possessive] treatments.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rickshaw runner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rickshaw runner in a bustling city. The hard physical work left [PAWN_objective] with little energy or interest for intellectual tasks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: terracotta miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: From dawn till dusk, [PAWN_nameDef] worked in the vast terracotta pits, often finding fragments of ancient warriors. These silent sentinels of the past ignited [PAWN_possessive] imagination, yet they were but whispers of a grand civilization lost to time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: jade prospector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Searching for veins of precious jade, [PAWN_nameDef] explored the deep tunnels of mist-covered mountains. The glimmer of green within the earth's heart was [PAWN_possessive] only companion, a silent promise of wealth and a testament to the relentless spirit of exploration.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: imperial chef
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the heart of the bustling imperial capital, [PAWN_nameDef] honed [PAWN_possessive] culinary skills. Creating elaborate dishes inspired by tales of phoenixes and dragons, [PAWN_pronoun] brought a touch of magic to every banquet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: yellow turban rebel
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In a time of turmoil, [PAWN_nameDef] joined the ranks of the Yellow Turbans, fervently believing in their vision of a world free from corruption. The rebellion may have been quelled, but the spirit of dissent lives on in [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bandit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Outlawed and cast out from society, [PAWN_nameDef] survived by raiding caravans along the ancient Silk Road. Life was harsh, but the tales of legendary outlaws whispered around the campfire filled [PAWN_pronoun] with a sense of camaraderie and purpose.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the grand armies of the empire, a single spear in a sea of banners. Amidst the thunderous drums and the roar of battle, [PAWN_pronoun] found a sense of unity and purpose.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rebel leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Driven by a vision of a better world, [PAWN_nameDef] rose against the tyrants of the land. [PAWN_pronoun] became a symbol of resistance, inspiring countless others with tales of [PAWN_possessive] deeds echoing across the realm.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: swift messenger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a swift messenger, delivering important messages across the vast expanse of the empire. [PAWN_pronoun] honed [PAWN_possessive] skills in navigating various terrains on horseback.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: mercury miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a miner, extracting cinnabar—the raw form of mercury—from the depths of the mountains. Over the years [PAWN_pronoun]'s mind was slowly poisoned by the mercury [PAWN_pronoun] sought.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Confucian scholar
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to the pursuit of knowledge and moral teachings. As a Confucian scholar, [PAWN_pronoun] delved into the classics, spreading wisdom and advocating for ethical conduct in both personal and societal realms. As with all good Confucians, [PAWN_pronoun] also just really hated women.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Taoist monk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] embraced the path of Taoism, seeking harmony and enlightenment. As a Taoist monk, [PAWN_pronoun] meditated in tranquil mountain monasteries, immersing [PAWN_objective]self in the mysteries of the universe and striving to attain balance between yin and yang.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: suspected sorcerer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Whispers and rumors followed [PAWN_nameDef] everywhere, branding [PAWN_objective] as a suspected sorcerer. [PAWN_pronoun] was summoned by a great lord of the land to act as an advisor, but [PAWN_possessive] frankly bat-shit crazy magic shit caused the lord to order [PAWN_possessive] execution. [PAWN_pronoun] only narrowly escaped this fate.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sandalmaker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] craft to creating exquisite sandals, weaving artistry into every stitch. With each sandal crafted, [PAWN_pronoun] left a mark of comfort and elegance upon the feet of [PAWN_possessive] people. [PAWN_pronoun] also had really big ears for some reason.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: poet
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], a master of words, conjured verses that danced upon the minds of listeners. [PAWN_pronoun] breathed life into emotions, capturing the essence of beauty, longing, and the ever-changing world, leaving behind a legacy of enchantment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: painter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wielded a brush like a magician, giving life to colors on the canvas. [PAWN_possessive] artwork transported viewers to realms of beauty and emotion, captivating hearts and minds with each stroke, immortalizing fleeting moments in a tapestry of pigments.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gibbon friend
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] formed an extraordinary bond with the gibbons that inhabited the ancient forests of [PAWN_possessive] home village. Through mutual respect and understanding, [PAWN_pronoun] became a companion to these graceful creatures, sharing in their playful antics and finding solace in the tranquility of nature.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: war refugee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fled their war-torn homeland, escaping the ravages of conflict. Displaced and burdened with memories of loss, [PAWN_pronoun] sought solace and a fresh start in a new land, yearning to rebuild [PAWN_possessive] life amidst the ashes of the past.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fireship survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] narrowly escaped a fiery catastrophe, akin to the legendary Battle of Red Cliffs. As a fireship survivor, [PAWN_pronoun] emerged from the chaos and destruction, forever marked by the flames that raged around [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: poet of later times
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] captured the essence of bygone eras through [PAWN_possessive] poetic verses. [PAWN_pronoun] weaved intricate words, painting vivid portraits of historical figures and events, breathing life into the pages of antiquity and immortalizing their stories in the hearts of the present generation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: eunuch procurer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional eunuch procurer for the imperial government. [PAWN_pronoun] became extremely skilled at the art of creating eunuchs with a single slice, and only very rarely did his patients die of blood loss or other complications from the process.
